channel.title: Real-Scape: Online since 2006!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/WD3Lx.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Play now at www.real-scape.com[/size][/center]
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Real-Scape/394489350622206?notif_t=page_user_activity][img width=50 height=50]http://i.imgur.com/puC1R.png[/img][/url][url=http://realscape.wikia.com/wiki/Real-Scape_Wiki][img width=50 height=50]http://i.imgur.com/TP6cZ.png[/img][/url][/center]
[size=16pt]Features:[/size]
[ul][li]VPS hosted, online 24/7[/li] [li] Great community[/li] [li] Great PKing[/li] [li] The Old-school skills[/li] [li] Stable economy[/li] [li] A large and friendly player community[/li] [li] Global stair and door handlers. Ever seen a RSPS where you can use every single door and stair in our available areas?[/li] [li] Perfected clipping systems. We offer realistic safe spots and no monster will every walk through a tree![/li] [li] Auto-Vote system[/li] [li] Many teleports[/li] [li] Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations[/li] [li] Many bosses[/li] [li] Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players[/li] [li] Explore our world which spans several RuneScape towns and dungeons[/li] [li] Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards - GWD as the ultimate challenge[/li] [li] Working highscores on our website[/li] [li] All 377 skills are fully working[/li] [li] and even more!!...[/li][/ul]
[size=24pt][b][glow=red,2,300]Media:[/glow][/b][/size]
All Skills working [img]http://i.imgur.com/8cOLm.png[/img]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6dg5r.png[/img]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EKIeo.png[/img]
[hr]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/m0UWV.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Want to see more?[/size]
[size=12pt]Visit us at www.real-scape.com[/size]
[hr]
Thanks, Tonto

item.title: Real-Scape: Online since 2006!

item.description:

The forums are back.
And it’s old school 317.

item.title: Real-Scape: Online since 2006!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

As T_R said nothing stands out, although this brings back good memories since this looks like the first server I ever played. Good Luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Real-Scape: Online since 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Bhpk:

[ul][li] Global stair and door handlers. Ever seen a RSPS where you can use every single door and stair in our available areas?[/li][/ul]

Yes, I know the man who wrote the Tutorial.

On Topic: Nothing stands out, but good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Real-Scape: Online since 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[center]

WD3Lx.png697×158
[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Play now at www.real-scape.com[/size][/center]

[center][/center]

[size=16pt]Features:[/size]

[ul][li]VPS hosted, online 24/7[/li]
[li] Great community[/li]
[li] Great PKing[/li]
[li] The Old-school skills[/li]
[li] Stable economy[/li]
[li] A large and friendly player community[/li]
[li] Global stair and door handlers. Ever seen a RSPS where you can use every single door and stair in our available areas?[/li]
[li] Perfected clipping systems. We offer realistic safe spots and no monster will every walk through a tree![/li]
[li] Auto-Vote system[/li]
[li] Many teleports[/li]
[li] Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations[/li]
[li] Many bosses[/li]
[li] Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players[/li]
[li] Explore our world which spans several RuneScape towns and dungeons[/li]
[li] Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards - GWD as the ultimate challenge[/li]
[li] Working highscores on our website[/li]
[li] All 377 skills are fully working[/li]
[li] and even more!!..[/li][/ul]

[size=24pt][glow=red,2,300]Media:[/glow][/size]

All Skills working
